parameters.code:
Script.Outputs = {
    FilterObject: "object",
    SiteId: "boolean",
    Description: "boolean",
    Availability: "boolean",
    "VSATAvailability": "boolean",
    "CellAvailability": "boolean",
    "VSATQoSPassed": "boolean",
    "CellQoSPassed": "boolean",
    "AuxQoSPassed": "boolean",
    "VSATLatency": "boolean",
    "CellLatency": "boolean",
    "AuxLatency": "boolean",
    "VSATJitter": "boolean",
    "CellJitter": "boolean",
    "AuxJitter": "boolean",
    "SwitchingEvents": "boolean",
    "DataUsage": "boolean",
    "Downtime": "boolean",
    "Done": "signal"
};

Script.Signals.Run = function() {
var filter = JSON.stringify({
  "site_id": true,
  "common_name": true,
  "availability": true,
  "v_availability": false,
  "c_availability": false,
  "v_sla_pass_mean": false,
  "c_sla_pass_mean": false,
  "a_sla_pass_mean": false,
  "v_latency_mean": false,
  "c_latency_mean": false,
  "a_latency_mean": false,
  "v_jitter_mean": false,
  "c_jitter_mean": false,
  "a_jitter_mean": false,
  "sw_ev_ct": false,
  "ttl_trf_ct_mb": false,
  "unknown": false
})


// Set default filter settings or use the ones stored in browser session
if(sessionStorage.getItem('filter') == null){sessionStorage.setItem('filter', filter)};


// Call browser filter to use as starting point

var fS = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('filter'))
  Script.Outputs.FilterObject = fS
  Script.Outputs.SiteId = fS.site_id
  Script.Outputs.Description = fS.common_name
  Script.Outputs.Availability = fS.availability
  Script.Outputs.VSATAvailability = fS.v_availability
  Script.Outputs.CellAvailability = fS.c_availability
  Script.Outputs.VSATQoSPassed = fS.v_sla_pass_mean
  Script.Outputs.CellQoSPassed = fS.c_sla_pass_mean
  Script.Outputs.AuxQoSPassed = fS.a_sla_pass_mean
  Script.Outputs.VSATLatency = fS.v_latency_mean
  Script.Outputs.CellLatency = fS.c_latency_mean
  Script.Outputs.AuxLatency = fS.a_latency_mean
  Script.Outputs.VSATJitter = fS.v_jitter_mean
  Script.Outputs.CellJitter = fS.c_jitter_mean
  Script.Outputs.AuxJitter = fS.a_jitter_mean
  Script.Outputs.SwitchingEvents = fS.sw_ev_ct
  Script.Outputs.DataUsage = fS.ttl_ctf_count_mb
  Script.Outputs.Downtime = fS.unknown
  Script.Outputs.Done()
}

parameters.requestScript:
Request.headers['authorization'] = 'Basic dmlzaW9uX3VzZXI6aGpheTZod24hbGFvNTU=';

Request.content = {
    session:localStorage.getItem('session'),
    bucket:  "fgt_" + JSON.parse(Inputs.Period).bucket + "s",
    measurement: "Fgt_Stats",
    source_fields: ["availability","v_sla_pass_mean","c_sla_pass_mean","a_sla_pass_mean"],
    site_ids: Inputs.SiteIds,
    end: "now()",
    start: JSON.parse(Inputs.Period).start,
    query_vars: ["1","2","3","4","5"],
    display_fields: ["v_sla_pass_mean","c_sla_pass_mean","a_sla_pass_mean"],
    1: "|> aggregateWindow(every: 999d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)",
    2: "|> pivot(rowKey: ['_time'], columnKey: ['_field'], valueColumn: '_value')",
    3: "|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with v_sla_pass_mean: r.v_sla_pass_mean - (100.0 - r.availability)}))",
    4: "|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with c_sla_pass_mean: r.c_sla_pass_mean - (100.0 - r.availability)}))",
    5: "|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with a_sla_pass_mean: r.a_sla_pass_mean - (100.0 - r.availability)}))"
};

Request.headers['authorization'] = 'Basic dmlzaW9uX3VzZXI6aGpheTZod24hbGFvNTU=';

Request.content = {
    session:localStorage.getItem('session'),
    bucket:  "fgt_" + JSON.parse(Inputs.Period).bucket + "s",
    measurement: "Fgt_Stats",
    source_fields: ["v_ul_trf_ct","v_dl_trf_ct","c_ul_trf_ct","c_dl_trf_ct","a_ul_trf_ct","a_dl_trf_ct"],
    site_ids: Inputs.SiteIds,
    end: "now()",
    start: JSON.parse(Inputs.Period).start,
    query_vars: ["1","2","3","4","5"],
    display_fields: ["ttl_trf_ct_mb"],
    1: "|> increase()",
    2: "|> last()",
    3: "|> toFloat()",
    4: "|> pivot(rowKey: ['_time'], columnKey: ['_field'], valueColumn: '_value')",
    5: "|> map(fn: (r) => ({_start: r._start, _stop: r._stop, _time: r._time, site_id: r.site_id, ttl_trf_ct_mb: (r.v_dl_trf_ct + r.v_ul_trf_ct + r.c_dl_trf_ct + r.c_ul_trf_ct + r.a_dl_trf_ct + r.a_ul_trf_ct) / 1000000.0}))"
};

parameters.code:
Script.Outputs = {
    Description: "string",
    Availability: "string",
    "VSATAvailability": "string",
    "CellAvailability": "string",
    "VSATQoSPassed": "string",
    "CellQoSPassed": "string",
    "AuxQoSPassed": "string",
    "VSATLatency": "string",
    "CellLatency": "string",
    "AuxLatency": "string",
    "VSATJitter": "string",
    "CellJitter": "string",
    "AuxJitter": "string",
    "SwitchingEvents": "string",
    "DataUsage": "string",
    "Downtime": "string"
}

Script.Signals.Run = function () {
    Script.Outputs.Description = "Description"
    Script.Outputs.Availability = "Availability"
    Script.Outputs.VSATAvailability = "VSAT Availability"
    Script.Outputs.CellAvailability = "Cell Availability"
    Script.Outputs.VSATQoSPassed = "VSAT QoS Passed"
    Script.Outputs.CellQoSPassed = "Cell QoS Passed"
    Script.Outputs.AuxQoSPassed = "Aux QoS Passed"
    Script.Outputs.VSATLatency = "VSAT Latency"
    Script.Outputs.CellLatency = "Cell Latency"
    Script.Outputs.AuxLatency = "Aux Latency"
    Script.Outputs.VSATJitter = "VSAT Jitter"
    Script.Outputs.CellJitter = "Cell Jitter"
    Script.Outputs.AuxJitter = "Aux Jitter"
    Script.Outputs.SwitchingEvents = "Switching Events"
    Script.Outputs.DataUsage = "Data Usage"
    Script.Outputs.Downtime = "Downtime"
};

Script.Inputs = {
    Enabled: "boolean"
};

Script.Outputs = {
    Description: "boolean",
    Availability: "boolean",
    "VSATAvailability": "boolean",
    "CellAvailability": "boolean",
    "VSATQoSPassed": "boolean",
    "CellQoSPassed": "boolean",
    "AuxQoSPassed": "boolean",
    "VSATLatency": "boolean",
    "CellLatency": "boolean",
    "AuxLatency": "boolean",
    "VSATJitter": "boolean",
    "CellJitter": "boolean",
    "AuxJitter": "boolean",
    "SwitchingEvents": "boolean",
    "DataUsage": "boolean",
    "Downtime": "boolean"
}

function onChange(){
    // If enabled true then we have not maxed out the allowed selection and ALL toggles can be enabled / operational.
    if (Script.Inputs.Enabled != null && Script.Inputs.Enabled){
        Script.Outputs.Description = true
        Script.Outputs.Availability = true
        Script.Outputs.VSATAvailability = true
        Script.Outputs.CellAvailability = true
        Script.Outputs.VSATQoSPassed = true
        Script.Outputs.CellQoSPassed = true
        Script.Outputs.AuxQoSPassed = true
        Script.Outputs.VSATLatency = true
        Script.Outputs.CellLatency = true
        Script.Outputs.AuxLatency = true
        Script.Outputs.VSATJitter = true
        Script.Outputs.CellJitter = true
        Script.Outputs.AuxJitter = true
        Script.Outputs.SwitchingEvents = true
        Script.Outputs.DataUsage = true
        Script.Outputs.Downtime = true
    }
    // If enabled is false then we have maxed out the allowed selection and need to send a disabled boolean to the toggles that are currently false.
    else {
        var cF = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('filter'))
        Script.Outputs.Description = cF.common_name
        Script.Outputs.Availability = cF.availability
        Script.Outputs.VSATAvailability = cF.v_availability
        Script.Outputs.CellAvailability = cF.c_availability
        Script.Outputs.VSATQoSPassed = cF.v_qos_pass_mean
        Script.Outputs.CellQoSPassed = cF.c_qos_pass_mean
        Script.Outputs.AuxQoSPassed = cF.a_qos_pass_mean
        Script.Outputs.VSATLatency = cF.v_latency_mean
        Script.Outputs.CellLatency = cF.c_latency_mean
        Script.Outputs.AuxLatency = cF.a_latency_mean
        Script.Outputs.VSATJitter = cF.v_jitter_mean
        Script.Outputs.CellJitter = cF.c_jitter_mean
        Script.Outputs.AuxJitter = cF.a_jitter_mean
        Script.Outputs.SwitchingEvents = cF.sw_ev_ct
        Script.Outputs.DataUsage = cF.ttl_trf_ct_mb
        Script.Outputs.Downtime = cF.unknown
    }
};


Script.Setters.Enabled = onChange;
